wikipedia_page.main: George Simpson Drynan Pattullo (4 November 1888 – 5 September 1953) was a Scottish football player and manager active primarily in Spain.

response: George Pattullo is the name of:
*George Pattullo (footballer) (1888–1953), Scottish footballer for FC Barcelona
*George Pattullo (rugby union) (c. 1893/1894–1968), Scottish rugby union player
